Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits that could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than just monetary value. However, for the sake of negotiation, I am initially offering this extraordinary product at an exclusive price of $15000. This generous offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your complete satisfaction. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product can add immense value to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
